name: eyewear
desc: Angular frames add definition to round faces by creating contrast with the curves of the face.

name: hairstyle
desc: Textured crops with short sides and a bit of height on top can elongate the face and add angles.

name: beardstyle
desc: A square beard can help create the illusion of a more angular jawline, balancing the roundness of the face.

name: cap
desc: Flat caps can add some height to the crown of the head, creating a more elongated look for round faces.

name: eyewear
desc: Cat-eye frames can add angles to a round face, creating a more balanced and elongated look.

name: hairstyle
desc: A long bob that falls just below the chin can create the illusion of a more oval face shape.

name: earrings
desc: Dangle earrings can elongate the face, creating a more balanced look for round faces.

name: makeup
desc: Contouring can help create shadows and definition along the sides of the face, especially on the temples, below the cheekbones, and along the jawline, to create a more sculpted look.
